Tired of having to manually export your ChatGPT conversations to your notes, Notion, etc?üòì

Not anymore!

The GPT2Markdown extension helps you export your conversations with ChatGPT in 1 click‚ö°Ô∏è

Features:

Do note that there may be instances where you activate the extension and will need to reload the page for the GPT2Markdown button to appear!

This is an open-source project; the source code is publicly available for anyone to review and contribute to at ¬´ https://github.com/0xreeko/gpt2markdown ¬ª
